result.execSummary:
The defendant Calvin L Conley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Habitual Criminality], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Portage County Clerk of Circuit Court

civilJdgmts.propDescr: Still DOC Collect - revoked sent prison/extended supervision.

miscConds.notes: If probation is discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil Judgment will be entered against the Defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. Per Wisconsin Statute, funds from prison accounts may be used for obligations in accordance with prison policy not to exceed 25% of gross.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Calvin L Conley
Current: 1411 Melissa Court, Plover, WI 54467 United States  (Effective: 10-03-2016)
Prior: 635 Ceape Street, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States

ADDRESS INFO for Calvin L Conley
Current: 635 Ceape Street, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2016)
Prior: 1411 Melissa Ct, Plover, WI 54467 United States

Defendant Calvin L Conley in court with attorney Acalia N Halverson. Defendant Calvin L Conley in custody. Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
All files heard: 15CM283, 15CM431 (Plea/sentencing), 15CM502 (Return on Warrant/Initial, Plea/sentencing)
9:41 a.m.  Court calls the cases. 

15CM502: 
Attorney/Defendant received copy of criminal complaint.
Court informs defendant of charges and maximum penalties.
Attorney/Defendant waives reading of complaint.

Plea questionnaire/Agreement filed.
Prosecutor states plea agreement.
Attorney for Defendant concurs with agreement stated.

Defendant enters a plea of: 

15CM283 Counts 1 & 2 - NO CONTEST
15CM431 Counts 1, 4 & 5 - NO CONTEST
15CM502 Count 1 - NO CONTEST

Court questions Defendant regarding plea.
Court informs Defendant of Constitutional Rights. Court advises Defendant of Elements State must prove for the Charge.
Court questions Attorney for Defendant.
Court finds Defendant's Plea is freely, voluntarily and intelligently made.
Attorneys stipulate that there is factual basis for the charge(s).

BY THE COURT:
Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charge(s).
Court finds the defendant guilty 15CM283 Counts 1 & 2, 15CM431 Counts 1, 4 & 5, 15CM502 Count 1.  Clerk directed to enter Judgment of Conviction this date.

Dismissed and read-in are: 15CM502 and 15CM431 Counts 2 & 3

Atty Constable makes sentencing arguments to the Court. 
Atty Halverson makes sentencing arguments to the Court. 

BY THE COURT:
24 months prison with 13 months initial confinement followed by 11 months extended supervision STAYED all running concurrent with each other.
Placed on probation for a period of 36 months running concurrent with each other: 
Pay costs including the DNA and (Domestic Abuse surcharge only in 15CM283)
AODA & comply with treatment recommendations.
Maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with all requirements of his agent with respect to all conditions of probation. 
Do not possess/consume controlled substances without a valid prescription and be taken according to the prescription. 
No violent or abusive contact with Jennifer Nilsen or Alison Buss. 
Provide a DNA sample. 
Counseling as deemed necessary and comply with counseling. 
Make restitution in 15CM431 of $244.00.  

Atty Constable addresses jail credit.

BY THE COURT:  
In 15CM283 - 64 days credit
In 15CM431 - 2 days credit
In 15CM502 -1 day credit

State has complied with Victim Rights Notification.

Attorney Acalia Halverson in court. Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Halverson states her client could not be present today and was just appointed on this case, but has authorization on his other cases. ADA Constable states her objections and requests a warrant be issued w/$1,000 cash alternative.
BTC: Criminal Warrant w/$1000 cash alternative - statewide
